extendedInfo.description: The cutting condition of Cemented cutting(Carbide tools) tool can be searched for easily. -The function of cutting calculation, volume calculation, power calculation, and work material search is equipped. It is possible to only choose each part number of DIJET, and to calculate a realistic cutting condition. -The selection result is being interlocked with various calculation programs, and is convenient.A PDF catalog and Video Files are downloaded into SD memory from a homepage by hope.-Your memory can be saved. Communication is unnecessary to calculation. The use in a factory does not have a problem, either. -A result can be obtained quickly. [Languages]--English.--Japanese
